effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
